Pre-Game Insights: Pargat, who has played in India's domestic circuit, opened up about the prospect of playing against his home country ahead of their final group stage clash on Saturday in Florida.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The India vs Canada match at the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 was abandoned on June 15 due to rain, with no play possible at the Central Broward Regional Park Stadium Turf Ground.
With the game abandoned due to rain, Rohit Sharma-led India and Canada each receive a point, as the toss couldn't take place in Florida.
This is not the first time a match was abandoned in Florida due to rain, earlier, matches between Sri Lanka-Nepal and United States-Ireland were also washed out.
India has already qualified for the Super 8 after clinching three consecutive wins in Group A.
Others: A hilarious meme fest began on X as the match was abandoned.
Many Indian-origin players on the Canada team, social media was also flooded with memes.
The Canadian team Indian origin players including Shreyas Movva, Navneet Dhaliwal, Pargat Singh, Ravinderpal Singh among others.
